channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Samsung kicks off its Aussie Black Friday sales early with up to AU$4,000 off its premium 8K TVs
item.description: The Samsung QN800D is a formidable TV for upscaling content to 8K-like quality. And now it's had up to AU$4,000 slashed from its price for Black Friday.
